hero.headline: Edge AI
hero.description: On-device intelligence that processes data locally, ensuring privacy and enabling offline-first applications. AI that works where your users are, not just where the cloud can reach.

capabilities.title: Local Processing
capabilities.description: Data never leaves the device unless explicitly authorized. Full GDPR and data sovereignty compliance by design.

capabilities.title: Offline Intelligence
capabilities.description: AI models that work without connectivity. Translation, document analysis, and decision support anywhere.

capabilities.title: Federated Learning
capabilities.description: Models improve across the network while keeping data local. Collective intelligence without data centralization.

useCases.title: Real-time Translation
useCases.description: Translate between 40+ languages instantly, even offline. Perfect for government services and education.

useCases.title: Intelligent Document Processing
useCases.description: Extract, classify, and process documents locally. Forms, IDs, and official documents handled with privacy.

useCases.title: Crop Analysis
useCases.description: Analyze plant health, soil conditions, and weather patterns to provide actionable farming insights.

useCases.title: Diagnostic Support
useCases.description: AI-assisted medical image analysis and symptom checking, supporting healthcare workers in remote areas.

howItWorks.title: Model Optimization
howItWorks.description: We compress and optimize state-of-the-art models to run efficiently on low-power hardware, without sacrificing accuracy.

howItWorks.title: Local Inference
howItWorks.description: All processing happens on the device. Data never leaves unless the user explicitly chooses to share insights for model improvement.

howItWorks.title: Federated Updates
howItWorks.description: Models improve over time through federated learning—sharing learnings, not data, across the network when connectivity is available.

privacyFeatures.title: GDPR Compliant
privacyFeatures.description: Data processing happens locally, making compliance straightforward. No cross-border data transfers required.

privacyFeatures.title: Data Sovereignty
privacyFeatures.description: Governments and enterprises maintain full control over their data. Perfect for sensitive applications.

privacyFeatures.title: Auditable
privacyFeatures.description: Full transparency into what models do and how they make decisions. No black boxes.

cta.headline: Ready to bring AI to the edge?
cta.description: Our team can help you identify the right AI capabilities for your use case and deploy them across your network of edge devices.
